attributes.action: Prohibit the use of Unproven Mosquito Technology
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Mosquito Anti-"Teen" device is designed to cause discomfort to teenagers, in the belief that all teenagers are problem causers and will be moved on...  However, the technology is not proven to affect ONLY this age group.  I have spoken to numerous people outside the teenage age bracket, and they are affected by this technology.  Ban the technology now as adults are being affected by it!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
